channel.title: Excel on Scenic-Shop
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Scenic-Shop

item.title: Architectural Units in Excel
item.description: Here we give out excel formulas to do math with architectural measurements (e.g. 14'-3"). I recently had to calculate the total area of our soft goods inventory. With over 80 drapes, that’s a lot of number crunching. Luckily our inventory is in an excel file, which includes the height and width of each drape. Okay, make a formula to calculate the square area from those values… Problem: the measurements are given in feet and inches (e.
